name: Gringo
description: GRINGO, a dark comedy mixed with white-knuckle action and dramatic intrigue, explores the battle of survival for businessman Harold Soyinka (David Oyelowo) when he finds himself crossing the line from law-abiding citizen to wanted...

review.author: mjtrayner
review.heading: Way better than the average rating!
review.reviewBody: Proper LOL comedy, unpredictable turns in the story that have you guessing and surprised the whole way through. Genuinely one of my favourite movies of late.

keywords: american abroad,american in mexico,drug kingpin,drug cartel,drug mule
